languages.text: {n}Кибелла смотрит на вас с отсутствующим выражением — лишь в уголке рта на мгновение возникает раздраженная складка от скрытой гримасы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла смотрит на вас с отсутствующим выражением — лишь в уголке рта на мгновение возникает раздраженная складка от скрытой гримасы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла смотрит на вас с отсутствующим выражением — лишь в уголке рта на мгновение возникает раздраженная складка от скрытой гримасы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with a vacant expression save from a line that briefly appears at the corner of her mouth — a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
{n}Kibellah looks at you with a vacant expression save from a line that briefly appears at the corner of her mouth — a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
{n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
{n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
{n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
{n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah blickt dich völlig ausdruckslos an, abgesehen von einer dünnen Linie, die sich kurz in einem Mundwinkel bildet: eine unterdrückte Grimasse der Pein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah blickt dich völlig ausdruckslos an, abgesehen von einer dünnen Linie, die sich kurz in einem Mundwinkel bildet: eine unterdrückte Grimasse der Pein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te observa sin expresión alguna, excepto por una delgada línea efímera en la comisura de sus labios: una mueca reprimida de irritación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te observa sin expresión alguna, excepto por una delgada línea efímera en la comisura de sus labios: una mueca reprimida de irritación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラは、口角に短いしわがかすかに寄っている以外、無表情であなたを見ている。それは悔しさを押し殺したような、不機嫌なものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、口角に短いしわがかすかに寄っている以外、無表情であなたを見ている。それは悔しさを押し殺したような、不機嫌なものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈看着你，脸上没有任何表情，但嘴角抿成了一条细线。很显然，她在努力压抑着她的烦恼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈看着你，脸上没有任何表情，但嘴角抿成了一条细线。很显然，她在努力压抑着她的烦恼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous regarde avec ce qui pourrait passer pour un air impassible, mais la fine ligne qui vient brièvement déformer ses lèvres ne vous échappe pas ; elle semble étouffer à grand-peine une grimace de contrariété.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah vous regarde avec ce qui pourrait passer pour un air impassible, mais la fine ligne qui vient brièvement déformer ses lèvres ne vous échappe pas ; elle semble étouffer à grand-peine une grimace de contrariété.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, yüzünde hiçbir ifade olmadan sana bakıyor. Hüznünden doğan ekşi ifadeyi bastırmasıyla kısa süreliğine dudağının kenarında beliren o incecik çizgiyi ise saklayamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you with no expression whatever, save for a thin line that forms briefly at the corner of her mouth: a stifled grimace of vexation.{/n}
